content.rendered:
RntrCheck

Customizable Tenant Screening Solutions for a Complete, 360-Degree View of Every Applicant.  

Explore and know

Features

and benefits

of our software

Income Verification

Leverage payroll and banking data for true financial insights, providing a clear picture of a prospective tenant's financial stability.

Document Analysis

Employ advanced fraud detection and parsing technologies to validate information accurately, ensuring all documentation is legitimate and up-to-date.

Assets Review

Assess financial stability through a detailed asset report, which includes an analysis of current assets to predict future financial responsibility.

Identity Verification

Utilize base checks, document verification, and selfie checks for unquestionable identity confirmation, safeguarding against identity theft.

Historical Data Access

Gain perspective with extensive transaction histories, offering a deep dive into a tenant’s financial behavior over time.

Criminal Records and Unwanted Activity Detection

Screen for criminal records and other unwanted activities to ensure the safety and security of your rental community.

Credit Scores and Financial Health

Evaluate credit scores and overall financial health to understand the financial reliability of prospective tenants.

Eviction History

Review a tenant’s eviction history to identify any previous rental disputes or defaults, helping you make informed leasing decisions.

Employment Verification

Get real-time insights on active employers to confirm employment status and stability of potential tenants.

Identity Fraud Protection

Ensure the person applying is who they say they are with advanced ID detection, including selfie verification, to combat identity fraud effectively.

Service advantages

Safety and Beyond

  • Criminal Records and Unwanted Activity Detection: Maintain safety with detailed criminal and activity screenings
  • Eviction History: Avoid potential issues by reviewing detailed eviction histories.
  • Document Analysis: Ensure all documentation is accurate and up-to-date with our advanced fraud detection technology.
Request free demo

Identity and Employment Verification

  • Identity Verification: Protect against identity theft with thorough checks and biometric verification.
  • Employment Verification: Verify employment stability with real-time data.
  • Identity Fraud Protection: Combat identity fraud with sophisticated detection methods.
  • Historical Data Access: Understand tenants’ financial behaviors with extensive historical data.
Request free demo

Financial Insight and Reliability

  • Income Verification: Gain insights into financial stability with detailed payroll and banking data analysis.
  • Credit Scores and Financial Health: Assess financial reliability through in-depth credit evaluations.
  • Assets Review: Evaluate financial responsibility through comprehensive asset reports.
Request free demo
